title: All Sky Downward Irradiance
discription: Shortwave incidence in all sky conditions. Units are energy/(area*days) - J/(m^2*days)

title: Clear Sky Surface Shortwave Downward Irradiance
discription: Shortwave incidence in clear sky conditions.A clear sky condition is defined generally as the absence of visible clouds across the entire sky dome, and clear sky irradiance is the irradiance occurring during these conditions(less 10% of cloud cover). Units are energy/(area*days) - J/(m^2*days)

title: All Sky Insolation Clearness Index
discription: Ratio of total solar radiation incident on a horizontal surface at the surface of the earth to the solar radiation incident at the top of the atmosphere

title: All Sky Normalized Insolation Clearness Index
discription: This is also a dimensionless property

title: All Sky Surface Longwave Downward Irradiation
discription: Downward longwave radiation is heat emitted back to Earth from the atmosphere and can change depending on the composition of the air.
